text: @ESPNNBA @mcten Yo prayers to the Lakers for being the only team who isn’t immune to the coronavirus and the only team that knew about Kobe’s passing damn. Lets also not forget Bron has grey in his beard and is old. How much more difficult can it get for them?😔
